titleStmt.title: A newe enterlude of vice conteyninge, the historye of Horestes with the cruell reuengment of his fathers death, vpon his one naturill mother. By John Pikeryng ...
History of Horestes
titleStmt.author: Pikering, John, fl. 1567.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Fletestrete, at the signe of the Falcon by Wylliam Gryffith, and are to be solde at his shope in S. Dunstons Churcheyearde,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shope in S. Dunstons Churcheyearde
